name: BAWOB - Beating Aliens With Oversized Balls
name_original: BAWOB - Beating Aliens With Oversized Balls
description:
BAWOB is a little platformer that was originally made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare. I have since reworked the game to make it look better, and I've also added the ability to control the game with a keyboard! (you used to only be able to use a controller)

Warning: This game features fast alternating colors, so if you're have photosensitive epilepsy, it might not be in your best interest to play this game.
